attributes.action: Close all Retail outlets from 7pm on Sunday to get behind England
attributes.additional_details: because youre the government and you can force shops close a 7pm, you know why you should do it, because its coming home.
attributes.background: Agree that all shops should be closed from 7pm Sunday, people have worked all the way through the pandemic, let us have this break

rejection.details:
Decisions about when to close retail outlets are a commercial matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may like to sign this petition calling for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
